channel.title: DAISY Accessible Publishing Knowledge Base
channel.description: Recent updates to the DAISY Accessible Publishing KB

item.title: Accessibility feature updates
item.description:
The accessibility hazard values are now covered in their own pages, providing updated information, examples of each value, and mappings to their ONIX equivalents.

The coverage of values has also been updated to include the individual unknown hazard properties - unknownFlashingHazard, unknownMotionSimulationHazard, and unknownSoundHazard.

item.title: Accessibility feature updates
item.description:
New pages are now available describing how to use the recently added latex-chemistry and MathML-chemistry pages.

The guidance on using the annotations value has been removed as the value has been deprecated.

item.title: Added ONIX mappings for accessibility features
item.description: The accessibilityFeature value pages now include mappings to their ONIX counterparts.

item.title: Added coverage of ONIX codelist 81
item.description: Codelist 81 describes the type of content in a publication. It is equivalent to the schema.org access modes.

item.title: Added coverage of ONIX codelist 143
item.description: The section on ONIX metadata has been expanded to include coverage of codelist 143, which defines codes for expressing information about potential hazards.

item.title: ONIX metadata section expanded
item.description: The ONIX metadata page has been replaced by new pages that individually cover each of the codes in that list. The update also adds coverage of all the new codes added in recent updates. Future updates will add coverage of codes outside of list 196 that are used to express accessibility information.

item.title: Prioritizing links to image descriptions
item.description: The page on providing image descriptions has been updated to prioritize the current best practice of using the aria-details attribute to reference a hyperlink to the description.

item.title: Knowledge base now available in Japanese
item.description: The knowledge base has been translated into Japanese. It is also available to Japanese users in the Ace by DAISY validation tool.
